entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 except northeast 50 gusting to 70 through mainland inlets and valleys. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 05:32 AM PST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except 60 gusting to 80 through mainland inlets and valleys. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 05:32 AM PST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 6.
